title: Pizza and Pasta de Verona
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Mexican, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a vegetarian section on the menu, of which some items are vegan. Vegetarians can eat burritos, tacos, pizza, rice with vegetables, sandwiches, hamburger and baguette. Vegans can eat rice with vegetables, sandwich, baguette, salads. Some plates can be made vegan; just ask. Two locations in Rota.
